title: SIGSEGV when using SKCanvas.DrawText() and then SKCanvas.Flush()
body:
### Description

The app crashes when drawing text and then flushing the canvas. Waiting on a response from Google to address this.

### Basic Information

- Version with issue:  1.68.0
- Last known good version:  1.60.3
- IDE:  N/A
- Platform Target Frameworks:
  - Android: 8.1 
- Target Devices:
  -   Pixel 2 and Razer Phone

### Links

 - skia bug: https://bugs.chromium.org/p/skia/issues/detail?id=8425
 - "repro" case: https://github.com/mattleibow/NativeAndroidSkiaSharp
